CommonFields.Title: A graphite nanoplatelet/epoxy composite with high dielectric constant and high thermal conductivity
Author: Chao Min
Demei Yu
Jingyu Cao
Guolong Wang
Lihua Feng

Additive.Description: Natural crystalline graphite flakes were intercalated by acid treatment to create the GNPs
Additive.Additive: Acid treatment (sulfuric acid and acetic acid)

Cooling.Description: Graphite underwent thermal shock before being added to acetone bath

Mixing.Description: Graphite was added in an acetone bath and then sonicated for exfoliation, after which GNP was obtained from the solvent
GNPs and a curing agent were added to the epoxy resin under ultra-sonication
Mixture resulting from ultra-sonication stirred for one hour to obtain a uniform dispersion

Scanning_Electron_Microscopy.Description: Used to examine the GNPs and fracture morphology of GNP/epoxy composites

XRay_Photoelectron_Spectroscopy.Equipment: Kratos Axis Ultra X-ray photoelectron spectrometer

AC_Dielectric_Constant.description: Dielectric constant of the GNP/epoxy composites on frequency at room temperature

Dielectric_Loss_Tangent.description: dissipation factor of the GNP/epoxy composites on frequency at room temperature

data.description: Ac conductivity of the GNP/epoxy composites on frequency at room temperature
